definition:
A morphism of schemes
$f: (X,{\mathcal{O}}_X) {\longrightarrow}(Y,{\mathcal{O}}_Y)$ is a
[*closed immersion*]{} if:

1.  As a map of topological spaces, $f: X {\longrightarrow}Y$ is a
    homeomorphism from $X$ into a closed subset of $Y$, and

2.  the morphism of sheaves
    ${\mathcal{O}}_Y {\longrightarrow}{\mathcal{O}}_X$ associated with
    $f$ is an in the category of sheaves.

This notion is the analog of the notion of in the category of
differential manifolds.
